oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greene, Walker - Letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A. R. Walker, New York, NY, to General Greene: describes "villainy and treachery" going on and his inability to confront the perpetrators; expresses thought that if he and his critics lived in "warmer climates there might be a lively time with the slanderers and traducers of my character."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
